newsitem.title: USA: Brandywine Realty buys five N.J. buildings.
newsitem.headline: Brandywine Realty buys five N.J. buildings.

text.p: Brandywine Realty Trust on Friday said it bought the office property holdings of Columbia Investment Builders Inc for $31.3 million.

The five buildings in Mount Laurel and Marlton, N.J. total 290,000 net rentable square feet, and are 94 percent leased. Brandywine also entered into an option agreement to buy a site next to one of the properties that could accommodate about 105,000 square feet of office space.
